hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Graveyard Dampe Race Hookshot Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Ice Arrows#.
